title: Daily Shortwave Solar Irradiance - GOES
summary: Estimation of the solar irradiance reaching the Earth surface, derived from the geostationary satellite GOES-E, produced by remapping over a 0.05° regular grid and expressed in W/m2. The daily value is the integration of all the hourly values in the UT day.
